title: Rust & Crimson Panelled Midi Dress
image_prompt: flat-lay product render of a women's midi dress, panelled design combining deep rust brown and rich crimson red sections, made of lightweight crepe with subtle sheen, short flutter sleeves, V-neckline, fitted waist with decorative buttons, isolated on plain white background, high-detail fabric texture, visible stitching and trims
techpack: Panelled A-line midi dress with rust brown and crimson red crepe panels, short flutter sleeves, V-neckline, fitted waist with antique gold buttons, invisible side zipper, cotton lining for comfort.
provenance: Designed from combination of brown and red color trend, inspired by contemporary Indo-western fusion aesthetics.
design_text:
